short_term: Complete CMMC implementation projects for current aerospace/automotive clients
Deploy JobAI system for manufacturing client
Optimize PowerBI data connectivity for improved client performance
long_term: Scale CMMC compliance consulting practice for defense supply chain
Develop AI-powered quality analytics as standardized service offering
Expand into new industry verticals beyond aerospace/automotive
Build repeatable technology solutions that can be deployed across multiple clients
key_metrics: Dashboard deployment efficiency and user adoption
Revenue growth from technology solutions vs traditional auditing
success_criteria: Clients achieve meaningful process improvements (not just compliance plaques)
Technology solutions provide actionable insights that drive business decisions
Remote delivery model scales effectively across diverse client base
Maintain expertise edge through continuous learning and tool adoption

project_prioritization: Client urgency and compliance deadlines (especially CMMC requirements)
Revenue impact and client retention value
Technology learning opportunities and skill development
Alignment with core expertise in quality systems and data analytics
technology_selection: Client accessibility and deployment constraints (Teams-based delivery)
Security and compliance requirements (especially for defense contractors)
Learning curve and knowledge expansion opportunities
Integration capability with existing client systems
resource_allocation: Balance between proven solutions and cutting-edge technology exploration
Leverage Tom's auditing expertise for quality system components
Use contractors strategically for specialized technical needs
Maintain bandwidth for continuous learning and tool mastery
risk_assessment: Technology obsolescence and staying current with tools
Cybersecurity risks when handling sensitive client data
Scope creep and project complexity management
Guest user access limitations affecting solution delivery

technical: Scaling custom solutions across diverse client environments
Managing guest user access limitations in Teams deployments
Balancing security requirements with usability for client users
Staying current with rapidly evolving technology landscape
Integrating with varied client ERP and legacy systems
organizational: Maintaining deep expertise across broad technology and industry spectrum
Managing multiple concurrent client projects with just 2 core team members
Building repeatable processes while maintaining customization flexibility
Knowledge transfer and documentation for client handoffs
resource: Balancing time between implementation work and continuous learning
Determining when to bring in contractors vs developing internal capabilities
Managing cash flow with varied project timelines and payment cycles
Investing in new tools and platforms for competitive advantage
compliance: Keeping current with evolving CMMC requirements and implementation guidance
Ensuring client data security across all technology solutions
Managing compliance requirements across multiple industry standards simultaneously
Documenting and maintaining audit trails for all client implementations

innovation_priorities: AI and machine learning integration for predictive quality analytics
Advanced data visualization and interactive dashboard technologies
Automation tools for accelerating client implementations
Cloud-based solutions for improved scalability and client access
Integration platforms for connecting diverse client systems
Cybersecurity tools and methodologies for enhanced client protection
Mobile and responsive interfaces for shop floor and field access
Real-time monitoring and alerting systems for proactive quality management
